ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: This candidate has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 11 years. Currently this candidate is employed as an Integrator at Prudential. This candidate has extensive knowledge of IBM WebSphere Application Server, Java 2 Enterprise Edition, IBM WebSphere, Microsoft SQL Server 2000, RDBMS, Microsoft SQL Server 2008, Microsoft Internet Information Server, Java, IBM Hardware, WebSphere MQ Portal, Visual Basic, UML/OMT, Seagate Crystal Reports, Microsoft SQL Server, Microsoft .NET Technology, IBM HTTP Server, DB2, Apache WEB Server, Oracle 9, Object Oriented Analysis/Design, JIRA. This candidate has some experience in managment (9 months).
ExperienceSummary.ManagementRecord: Since 2007-02 for 9 months the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a Offshore Team Lead at IBM India Ltd..
